name: Make Number
description:
It is a number combination game using 4 rules and 2048 games with a cyber background.

It's not a difficult level of difficulty, but it requires quickness, and as the steps increase, the speed of the upcoming numbers increases.

 Fast calculation and quickness to defend unnecessary numbers are absolutely necessary.

Blocks that need to be destroyed appear at the top, bounce off the approaching ball, break all of it, and even make the correct answer to move on to the next step.

You can compete with users around the world with scores and steps up to situations where you fail or cannot continue by playing at once.

Try to make a whole new number!

CAUTION: If you're not smart, you can't clear it! 

Don't throw your phone because you're angry!
